name: D-Faced
description:
Are you fake? Are you real? Are you determined?  Challenge the norms, find freedom and discover yourself. D-Faced is a fun puzzle platformer with a captivating dystopian story.

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Team:

Zombie Crunch

Members:

Me - Tanicorn(Designer/Programmer)

Joseph Scobbie - Scobmyster(Programmer)

Duncan Rendall - Rendeveloper(Programmer/Audio)

Cyprian Przybyla - cyps(Artist)

Elspeth Nicol - Wandering Owl(Artist)

Melina García Ayala - Creativenchoatic(Artist)

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

How To Play:

Go through the factory, and collect all masks and head up to the top to escape.

a - left

d - right

spacebar - jump

spacebar(blue) x 2 - double jump

s(green) - crouch

e - use levers

e(red) - break walls

e(yellow) - use generators

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

The game was made in 30 hours, all assets were made by the team.
